name: Benji Challenges
description: Benji Challenges is a fun and casual platformer where you control the monkey Benji, swinging from vine to vine. Features gorgeous graphics, intuitive control mechanics and 50 hand-crafted levels of challenging gameplay!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Additional Notes: Low requirements with options for disabling heavy graphical operations
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Memory: 2048 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Additional Notes: Low requirements with options for disabling heavy graphical operations

reviews.review_text: This is a game that proves the theory 'You can dress a turd and make it look great, but a turd is still a turd'.   The game looks great, but the gameplay and controls are so horrible that looks can't save it at all.
